programme.title: George Clarke's Old House, New Home
programme.desc: George Clarke meets single father Rick, whose four-storey terrace in Stratford-upon-Avon has just one room per floor. Can the architect come up with a clever redesign?

programme.title: The Split
programme.desc: Christie is mad because Hannah ended their relationship, while Hannah tries to hide any evidence of their affair. Hannah's personal and professional lives mix up when Nathan and his pupil Chloe help her with the Hansen case. Hannah negotiates Fi's divorce during the launch of their TV format,...

programme.title: SOS solidarité : opération rénovation
programme.desc: Nick Knowles and the DIY SOS team construct two brand new buildings for the Grenfell community, starting with a new home for the Dale Youth Boxing Club.

programme.title: Still Open All Hours
programme.desc: There is a large batch of tinned beans and in order to increase sales Granville asks for the help of Mr Machin, a local customer. programme.title: Ben Fogle: Return to the Wild
programme.desc: Ben Fogle returns to meet his previous contributors who set up home in remote locations. In this episode, he returns to see the Owens in the Yorkshire Dales.

programme.title: The Great British Sewing Bee
programme.desc: Claudia Winkleman welcomes the four remaining sewers back to the sewing room. They face three challenges - none of which permit the use of a pattern.

programme.title: Impossible
programme.desc: Quiz show in which the 30 contestants competing across the series must avoid giving impossible answers to give themselves a chance of winning £10,000.

programme.title: Bargain Hunt
programme.desc: The reds and the blues are hunting for bargains at the Newmarket Antiques Fair in Suffolk, with experts Caroline Hawley and Danny Sebastian ready to give a helping hand.

programme.title: SOS solidarité : opération rénovation
programme.desc: PC Kris was a victim of the terrorist attack on Westminster Bridge in London, and his north London home is now inaccessible. DIY SOS helps this injured officer get home.

programme.desc: When one of Chris' painters calls in sick, he reluctantly agrees to let Leslie take on a decorating job for an elderly chap called Graham. How hard can that be?
